title: Wayward Valentine
description: After being kidnapped, abused and having to watch the man she loved fight for his life, Anslie Davoli has finally gotten her happily ever after. Seven years after they met, Brantley Insico finally has everything her never knew he wanted. He has his boys and the girl of his dreams back in his life. Things are as perfect as they can be in a MC.  Valentine’s Day is here and Brantley wants to make sure that ANslie has the perfect day. He enlists the help of the twins and his parents. He’s got it all planned out and can’t wait to show her what she means to him. Can he make her day perfect of will it go down in flames?
author: K. Renee
